headline.main: STIMSON SUBPOENAED TO SPY TRIAL HERE; Testimony Sought on Secrecy of the Norden Bombsight

lead_paragraph: A subpoena issued yesterday in United States District Court in Brooklyn called for the appearance of Secretary of War Henry L. Stimson there on Monday morning as a witness for the defense in the espionage trial in Brooklyn.
